terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version Phase 1 Study - What sort of reasons did you have for thinking about wanting to die or killing yourself? Was it to end the pain or stop the way you were feeling (in other words you couldn't go on living with this pain or how you were feeling) or was it to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others? Or both? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version Phase 1 Study - Reasons for Most Severe Ideation (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicidality Severity Rating Scale Baseline/Screening Version Phase 1 Study - What sort of reasons did you have for thinking about wanting to die or killing yourself? Was it to end the pain or stop the way you were feeling (in other words you couldn't go on living with this pain or how you were feeling) or was it to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others? Or both? (Past 6 Months).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline/Screening Version Phase 1 Study - Reasons for Most Severe Ideation (Past 6 Months)
